duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee month-end general ledger close and complex account analysis, including international and technical accounting.
Manage the General Ledger, International Accounting, and Financial Reporting functions for multiple entities.
Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual submissions to leadership in US GAAP and IFRS.
Assure timely and accurate reconciliation of all worldwide balance sheet accounts.
Lead accurate and timely month-end, quarter-end, and year-end close procedures for all balance sheet and income statement accounts.
Develop, implement, and maintain key policies and procedures for all general accounting functions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Accounting. CPA Preferred
